column2: "Looks like you're doing well, <%me>. That's a pretty good fighting stance."
"But I still don't know what it is about your fighting style. Seems kind of off."
"Hmm, I can't really explain it. It's on the tip of my tongue, but..."
"Ah, never mind. Sorry, I must have been thinking about someone else. Don't mind me."
"Anyway, sorry to confuse you. Do me a favor and forget I said anything, okay?"
